channel.title: Daily Express :: World Feed
channel.description: Simply The Best 7 Days A Week

item.title: Israel-Iran: Horror as civilians trapped in tower after Tehran's attack
item.description: Israel has carried out "preemptive" missile strikes against Iran's nuclear sites. Tehran has launched less than 100 drones in retaliation.
item.author: William Morgan,James Knuckey,Richard Ashmore,Lotti OBrien,Alice Scarsi
item.media:keywords: Iran, Israel, Middle East, State of Emergency

media:content.media:description: Images appear to show explosion at Iran's Natanz nuclear site as it was targeted by Israeli strikes

media:thumbnail.media:description: Images appear to show explosion at Iran's Natanz nuclear site as it was targeted by Israeli strikes

item.title: British tourists in Venice, Barcelona, Majorca and Lisbon this Sunday issued warning
item.description: Just a few months ago, protestors blocked the view of a coach full of tourists parked near the Sagrada Familia in Barcelona and pelted them with water guns while chanting "tourists go home".
item.author: Eleanor Burleigh

media:content.media:description: Brits on holiday in cities across Europe have been warned about the protests

media:thumbnail.media:description: Brits on holiday in cities across Europe have been warned about the protests

item.title: Airbnb fires back as it blames 1 thing in furious tourism overcrowding row
item.description: Using a stack of data, the holiday property company has hit back at those blaming it for overtourism issues.
item.author: Holly Kintuka
item.media:keywords: European Union, Hotels, Airbnb, Overtourism, overtourism, hotel industry, spain,. airbnb report, data, overtourism debate, airbnb hits back at hotels, hotel stays increase, airbnb calls on city leaders, overtourism in europe, . airbnb report

media:content.media:description: Overtourism has led to a housing crisis in Spain

media:thumbnail.media:description: Overtourism has led to a housing crisis in Spain

item.title: The Canary Island that's nearly 100% less crowded than Lanzarote
item.description: The one Canary Island that's 97% less crowded than Lanzarote and is packed with stunning sights.
item.author: Jennifer Pinto
item.media:keywords: Tourism, Canary Islands, Tenerife, El Hierro, Sustainable Tourism, UNESCO Biosphere Reserve

item.title: Putin's general calls for massive mobilisation as he declares 'WW3 has already started'
item.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said his country's military had targeted Iran's attempts to build a nuclear bomb with its overnight strikes.
item.author: Alice Scarsi,Will Stewart
item.media:keywords: Iran-Israel conflict, Iran, Israel, Russia, Vladimir Putin, World War 3

media:content.media:description: Israel launched an attack against Iran overnight

item.title: 'I survived plane crash in same 11A seat as Brit survivor of Air India disaster’
item.description: A fellow crash survivor reveals he was sitting in the same lucky seat as the miracle man from the Air India disaster.
item.author: Lotti OBrien
item.media:keywords: Air India plane crash, India, Plane, Air India disaster, plane crash survivor, seat 11A, Ruangsak Loychusak

item.title: 'I missed the Air India flight that crashed by 10 minutes - this is what saved my life'
item.description: Bhoomi Chauhan said she begged staff to let her board the doomed plane after arriving at the airport 10 minutes late.
item.author: Eleanor Burleigh
item.media:keywords: Air India plane crash, India, india, plane crash victims, world news

media:content.media:description: The Bristol-based student missed the flight by just 10 minutes

item.title: Cornered Iran faces humiliation or war as leadership left on brink by Israeli strikes
item.description: EXCLUSIVE: Air raids deep into Tehran killed senior commanders and exposed Iran's defences - now the regime must retaliate or risk appearing powerless.
item.author: Marco Giannangeli
item.media:keywords: Iran, Iran-Israel conflict, Donald Trump, USA, Israel-Iran conflict, Iranian military response, US-Iran nuclear deal, Middle East security dynamics

media:content.media:description: Israel's strikes leave Iran struggling to respond

item.title: The world’s biggest IKEA 5,802 miles from Sweden
